places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Grand Xenia
address: Foy Sagar Rd, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: Very good experience.  View from rooms were toooo good. Very tasty food and Lavish Breakfast spread. Staff was very caring and well mannered. Only drawback is its away from main city,but green well maintained lawns and peaceful surroundings will make your stay fresh and happy.
I would love to come whenever I want to relax. Good rooms, service, and the view is breathtaking. Staff and the manager, Mr. Ashish, are all so kind and polite and always ready to help.

A sorry excuse for a 4 star hotel.

After a long journey all me and my family wanted was some rest, but unfortunately from the moment we opened the doors to our rooms (3 double occupancy rooms) a never ending parade of problems walked our way.

Multiple instances of key card not working
Room not serviced
The bathrooms had no water
Pipes were malfunctioning
The soap dispensers were out of order
Phones not working

And the list goes on...

I personally asked one of the people in the reception why this was so and she replied with a big smile "The service is bad and this was the case since she joined"

All I could do was smile back

Note: We were part of a tour group and this was the stay arranged by them, I have made sure that they won't choose Xenia the next time around.

"Visit at this hotel for a wedding and it exceeded all expectations! The ambiance is elegant, the catering service was exceptional, and the garden provided a picturesque backdrop for the ceremony. The marriage hall was spacious and beautifully decorated. Additionally, ample parking space and well-appointed rooms added to the convenience. Highly recommend this venue for any special occasion!"

Really awesome Ambience of this hotel, too much yummy breakfast, tasty food, feel so romantic dinner floor on the roof top.... I really like 508 Room.... NEXT TIME I WILL BE BOOK 508 😜 STAFF IS TOO GOOD AND SUPPORTIVE..... THANKU SO MUCH FOR THE BEST MEMORIES

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Mansingh Palace, Ajmer
address: Gaurav Path, Vaishali Rd, Tarachand Ka Bhatta, Vaishali Nagar, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: I came from the United States for my wedding here and I want to recognize the staff and management for going above and beyond in their preparation, food service, hospitality, and customer service. Coming from overseas, it is difficult to make arrangements and I’m truly impressed and thankful for their accommodations. Everyone had a safe and amazing time. Our ceremony went up to 4am and management was still on-site to check in on us. I’ve travelled all over the world and the service here is truly world class. My partner and I will be back to stay here anytime we come back to Ajmer!

Nice ambience, good food, centrally located, well behaved staff.  Drawbacks - food has become costly, Rooms need upgradation , parking problem when there is a party. Yet I would be liberal giving 4 stars.

I just went there for dinner with family.
The ambience was just ok.
The live performer was singing as if he hadn't had any food since ages.
The staff was well behaved but probably the hotel doesn't want to spend on their attire. Some waiters were wearing dirty and torn shirts.
The waiters didn't know about the dish preparation. They don't even know what kind of scotch they have in the bar.
And most importantly the food.. it was pathetic in taste. I ordered 6 dishes and they all helped me ruining my evening.
I paid just under 7000/ (INR) for a pathetic service, pathetic food, pathetic drink and a sleepy live performer.
And... They are selective about accepting a credit card.
Also, the washroom was stinky & messy.
One star is more than enough.

Just working on old reputation. I continued stay because of receptionist Ms Sonali's helping nature. All othetr staff is working for tip. Breakfast was poor quality and staff at breakfast was attending to customer who offers Tip (money) . Few staff is also good..One of plumber technician helped me very well.
But 90 % staff is only working for tip. No proper food service. Water pressure at wash basin was very slow.

Extremely bad experience. When you call, they say we can discuss on room tariff, once you arrive there with baggage...they have zero considerations. Not a ethical way of doing business.

They even deny for hair oil pouch.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Merwara Estate
address: Hotel Merwara Estate, Near, Daulat Bagh Rd, Ganj, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: The hotel looks antique with its great heritage but it desperately needs a serious maintenance. The room was neat and tidy. The washroom, hot water were not running, the cushion cover and the bed runners are too old, and the curtains are also run down, even the windows were dirty. The service overall were satisfactory, the staff were quite polite, the buffet seating area is in great need of makeover. It is regrettable to point out that such a remarkable hotel seating in a perfect location, to be so close to its truly beautiful state just out of loutrous touch.

Cannot complain about the location . It's perfect!!!
The rooms are royal, so is the view and the ambience .
Service needs a major upgrade.
The bridal suites have the common toilet drainage running into the bathing area. So it stinks like a gutter the entire room everytime someone shots or pees.

We recently went for my sister's wedding.
Needs a lot of maintenance ...
I had to send my man to buy Ala Robin bleach and pour it into the drains , show the staff that till they re route the drainage system which is severely lacking .

This property is on one of the best location of Ajmer ..how ever the maintainance is the major issue .There is no proper upkeep .The hotel owner has to start thinking for the same or else he should tie up with some good renowned group for managing the same.The prices are also equal to some good managed property. So customer do not get value for their money .the size of room are BiG and view from some rooms are also very nice ..Food is OK ..

An old styled Heritage hotel known for its legacy.

Near to Daulat baag and Anna Sagar Lake with beautiful view and luxury.

Enough space for car parking at two levels.

Good space for weddings and functions.

Attended marriage function only. So no reviews for rooms, services and activities. Ambiance was good. Space management seen one of the better in recent times. Views are good in all directions. Parking space is a problem as usual.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel LN Courtyard
address: Road, near Sbbj Bank, Shastri Nagar, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: Very bad experience, staff was very bad and rude , they don't have manners to attend and welcome  guest , no politeness and humbleness has seen in any staff members, and they have very dirty pillow and blankets, and the bed  is very small queen size if you are taking good amount for the room then you also have to provide good room service to your guest and if you are tall then you have to be very alert about the fan, bcoz the distance between the floor and fan is very less, it may injured you. I will never recommended this hotel to anyone and for sure I will also not booked this hotel ever in my Life..

Had stayed here for one night. Centrally located in Ajmer and easily accessible by local auto. They have limited parking space as well in case you are coming by your own car. I stayed here for one night in deluxe room with 2 A and 2 kids. Barring some small issues, it was a good modern setup hotel. Front desk was super helpful . They have a rooftop bar as well. Nothing major for kids, wifi signal was good.  Overall no major issues and good for small stay.

One of the finest hotels in the heart of Ajmer. This quality property does give you all the required amenities which you expect from any 4/5 star hotel. This place is approximately 10-12 minutes from the railways station ( consider going by an auto) and is on the main road near the local market.
The bar and the food menu is really diverse and one can find anything and everything.
The room was spacious and the interiors were great too.
The staff and the line manager,Manoj was courteous and one could feel it while conversing.
For those who don't wish to spend more on in house booze are recommended to buy from outside.
The other must places to visit are not too far from this property
So, do give this hotel a try and take out your inner vlogger to comment further.
Adios.

It's situated near Jawahar Rangmanch. It's a hotel and restaurant. Hotel rooms are quite good and clean. Food is also very good but it's not pocket friendly. Free parking is available here. And wheelchair is also accessible. Ajmer railway station is near about 1.5km from here and ajmer bus stand is near about 1km.
Very good room very good service very good location so beautiful so elegant just looking like wooow

places_with_reviews.name: The Archis Castle
address: Nehru Nagar, Madar, near bhero Mandir, Adarsh Nagar, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: Wonderful place to spend an evening. Food is good but a little overpriced. The ambiance is great. They should keep a baby chair in a restaurant so that parents with young kids can enjoy the food.

Archis Castle is a wonderful place, the hotel here is very beautiful, it would be great to come with family, there is a fake aeroplane, a bot in the hotel, only if you want to be photographed then you can come here.

This place is built on a deserted place, which makes it very interesting. It is a very big resort, there is a lift facility, there is a restaurant and there is also a separate room for sitting.

There is a huge airplane built above this resort which has the facility to sit. After sitting inside it, you will get the feeling of being on a real plane. There are many statues in this resort which are very beautiful.

Place is good to visit. Good place to explore. Rooftop is really good and they have small Disc kind of place where anyone can dance and enjoy and it's free.

Food quality is good but day by day they are degrading the taste

The view is nice but it's not worth going all the way for food. The restaurant had a lot of flies, the washroom was dirty, it was overpriced and the food didn't even taste good. The staff isn't nice either.

Good place to visit with family, nice ambience, good food but not for events purpose like anniversaries or marriages as they have the worst management team, no corporation from staff, no help in case of emergencies plus the prices are overhyped

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sanwar Sharif
address: FJ6H+295, Dargah Bazar, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: This hotel is good.reasonable during Ramadan.People are supportive.nearby dargah very accessible by walk.
Nice Room And Nice Helper To All item Is A Wonderful
Visit only if you're pro believer I like their cleaning
Nice place , must visit for blessings
Excellent service. They have not given GST Bill to any Customer No Bill  But charged for every thing.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Ajmer Inn
address: Churi Bazar, Purani Mandi, near Nagar Nigam, Naya Bazaar, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text:
Obviously I have choosen this hotel after seeing the reviews. We were amazed too seeing the property.

But heartfelt!!!
We have an unusual experience that this hotel has thieves too. Entire staff and the owner.

Firstly our train was delayed hence we checked in late at night around 11/11:30pm and they asked us to checkout by 12noon, though we agreed as we were here to seek blessings. However they cooperated to keep our luggage at their luggage room, unfortunately they did not have cctv in that room (which we totally forgot to check) and the toss, our wallet got disappeared from the bag along with 1 of the adhar card kept in the same place. Staff and the owner are least bothered to help us. Because of them we missed our next train. We literally begged to give us the ID’s and cards atleast.

We all were seating at the reception and the staff’s like ignoring us like what can we do.

Is this the hospitality…? Shame on you thieves.

People Be Wise before selecting!!!

one of the best decisions to chose this hotel ajmer inn.A very good property located in centre of city.  friendly staff specially reception Manager Mr Dinesh , He is nice  person. well Maintained Property,Highly Recommend.....

Nice n pleasant stay with family just because of Mr virender he was so co operative n understand us. upgraded our room also,and dealing with guest he knows so well.Mr .Virender is always  there for us n he concern about us.. Thanku.

One week ago I stayed in this Hotel
Location of Hotel is very much convenient to all major areas of Ajmer
Facilities in hotel & hospitality is marvellous in Hotel Ajmer Inn
Mr.Dinesh sir is very polite, very caring person & with his help my Dargah darshan has become very easy & I never forget his help, special thanks to him
Mr. Veerender sir also very nice person & polite & helpful person
Finally it's a wonderful & marvellous journey
Thank you so much Hotel Ajmer Inn & Make My Trip

Nice rooms. Good staff. Well maintained.
Lots thanks to. Virendra Singh.

places_with_reviews.name: The Royal Melange Beacon, Ajmer
address: Power House, Jaipur Rd, Opposite City, Sundar Vilas, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text: Very helpful staff. Well appointed rooms. Though we stayed only overnight, facilities provided were very good.

Hotel prices are reasonable
Rooms are nice
Staff Behaviour is also good.
Parking facility available
One good thing about this hotel is location
Location is near main market you can find anything from the market at midnight also

Hotel nearby bus stand area
Overall experience is good

I had a fantastic stay at the hotel! The staff was incredibly friendly and went above and beyond to make our visit memorable. They not only arranged a visit to Ajmer Shareef Dargah but also accompanied a khadim who recited dua, enhancing our experience. The gesture of offering a discount on our second-day stay showcased their commitment to customer satisfaction. Highly recommend this hotel for its hospitality and thoughtful service.
Overall is a wonderful place and had a nice stay. The staff is very cooperative and having good behaviour. The is a scope of improvement in food variety specially in starter..

Big room, comfy beds, good air con, excellent breakfast, very nice staff, quiet at night.
Wi fi and hot water were patchy.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL VIVAN PINNACLE
address: NEETI MARG, 260/4, Jaipur Rd, Muslim Mochi Mohalla, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text:
Very poor hospitality, we had to keep our luggage in room and then during checkout also.
The standards were high in ajmer but this hotel serves tasteless food.
Rooms were not cleaning. We booked suite and there was dust in the room as if the rooms has not been opened from days.

In mmt hotel has mentioned there is parking but there is parking only for 2 vehicles. Don't trust this hotel by mmt or any other online platform.

We stayed for 2 Nights in Vivan Pinnacle Ajmer and we want to share our below experience.

Location, Rooms, Services is very good but We do not suggest if you are a Family. This hotel is having Liquor Bar on the ground floor and You feel very uncomfortable when you come to reception area. We also have a horrible night due to drunked peoples Shouting and bad noices till 2.45 AM. So don't take a risk with family.

Other thing is Food. It is overcharged and not up to the mark in Taste.

it's a great place to stay and location is very good just five minutes away from station and bus stand.... completely corporate hotel...if u have budget around 2000-2500 then u must try this place.... restaurant is costly....some people criticise for darkness in the room but IMO it is not like that after that u'll get good vibes in the room as interior is too good....

We stayed for one night We have traveled extensively but never before experienced this level of quality and service. Every part of the experience seems to have been choreographed to meet the needs of the guests. From the welcome to departure the service and hospitality from all staff sets this hotel to marvel at Food was very good, specially the breakfast buffet which had a variety of options and the manager made sure we didn't have to wait during the breakfast buffet. He also went an extra mile to We had a great time, thank you
The room was tidy and spacious. The washroom was clean and hygienic. The location of the hotel was to a great distance from the railway station, ajmer fort, Ajmer Sharif Dargah and Ana Sagar lake.

places_with_reviews.name: LODHA INN
address: Prithivi Raj Marg Gandhi Bhawan Circle, Nr Nagar Nigam, Railway Colony, Ajmer, Rajasthan 305001, India

reviews.text:
A nice and budgeted place to stay in Ajmer. Very big property with different size of rooms from big rooms to small rooms
The staff and service also was very good.  Had dinner yesterday in their restuarant, it was really very delicious

The Lodha Inn Ajmer is a great place to stay. though basic the rooms are big and spacious.  There is a chaiwala around all the time.
The kitchen has good vegetarian food.
The compound is safe for children to play with in the complex.

Room is clean & Good for 2 person in 1000+gst....
Dinner test is good (gujarati test ) in only 140/-
The rooms differ based on your requirement. It's proximity to the ajmer railway station makes it ideal place for stay if you are looking for homely accomodation.
It's my first day here and it's nice place to stay as well as this place is near the main ajmer junction railway station. The staff is polite.
